verses.verse: The Revelation <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> gave <WG1325> unto him, <WG846> to show <WG1166> unto his <WG848> servants <WG1401> things which <WG3739> must <WG1163> shortly <WG1722> <WG5034> come to pass; <WG1096> and <WG2532> he sent <WG649> and signified <WG4591> it by <WG1223> his <WG848> angel <WG32> unto his <WG848> servant <WG1401> John: <WG2491>

Who <WG3739> bare record <WG3140> of the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> of the <WG3588> testimony <WG3141> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and <WG5037> of all things that <WG3745> he saw. <WG1492>

Blessed <WG3107> is he that readeth, <WG314> and <WG2532> they that hear <WG191> the <WG3588> words <WG3056> of this prophecy, <WG4394> and <WG2532> keep <WG5083> those things which are written <WG1125> therein: <WG1722> <WG846> for <WG1063> the <WG3588> time <WG2540> is at hand. <WG1451>

John <WG2491> to the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> churches <WG1577> which <WG3588> are in <WG1722> Asia: <WG773> Grace <WG5485> be unto you, <WG5213> and <WG2532> peace, <WG1515> from <WG575> him which is, and which was, and which is to come; <WG3801> and <WG2532> from <WG575> the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> Spirits <WG4151> which <WG3739> are <WG2076> before <WG1799> his <WG848> throne; <WG2362>

And <WG2532> from <WG575> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> who is the <WG3588> faithful <WG4103> witness, <WG3144> and the <WG3588> first begotten <WG4416> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> dead, <WG3498> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> prince <WG758> of the <WG3588> kings <WG935> of the <WG3588> earth. <WG1093> Unto him that loved <WG25> us, <WG2248> and <WG2532> washed <WG3068> us <WG2248> from <WG575> our <WG2257> sins <WG266> in <WG1722> his own <WG848> blood, <WG129>

And <WG2532> hath made <WG4160> us <WG2248> kings <WG935> and <WG2532> priests <WG2409> unto God <WG2316> and <WG2532> his <WG848> Father; <WG3962> to him <WG846> be glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> dominion <WG2904> forever and ever. <WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

Behold, <WG2400> he cometh <WG2064> with <WG3326> clouds; <WG3507> and <WG2532> every <WG3956> eye <WG3788> shall see <WG3700> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> they also which <WG3748> pierced <WG1574> him: <WG846> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> kindreds <WG5443> of the <WG3588> earth <WG1093> shall wail <WG2875> because of <WG1909> him. <WG846> Even so, <WG3483> Amen. <WG281>

I <WG1473> am <WG1510> <WG3588> Alpha <WG1> and <WG2532> <WG3588> Omega, <WG5598> the beginning <WG746> and <WG2532> the ending, saith <WG5056> the <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> which is, and which was, and which is to come, <WG3801> the <WG3588> Almighty. <WG3841>

I <WG1473> John, <WG2491> who also <WG2532> am your <WG5216> brother, <WG80> and <WG2532> companion <WG4791> in <WG1722> tribulation, <WG2347> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> and <WG2532> patience <WG5281> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> was <WG1096> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> isle <WG3520> that is called <WG2564> Patmos, <WG3963> for <WG1223> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> for <WG1223> the <WG3588> testimony <WG3141> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

I was <WG1096> in <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151> on <WG1722> the <WG3588> Lord's <WG2960> day, <WG2250> and <WG2532> heard <WG191> behind <WG3694> me <WG3450> a great <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> as <WG5613> of a trumpet, <WG4536>

saying, <WG3004> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> <WG3588> Alpha <WG1> and <WG2532> <WG3588> Omega, <WG5598> the <WG3588> first <WG4413> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> last: <WG2078> and, <WG2532> What <WG3739> thou seest, <WG991> write <WG1125> in <WG1519> a book, <WG975> and <WG2532> send <WG3992> it unto the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> churches <WG1577> which <WG3588> are in <WG1722> Asia; <WG773> unto <WG1519> Ephesus, <WG2181> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> Smyrna, <WG4667> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> Pergamos, <WG4010> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> Thyatira, <WG2363> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> Sardis, <WG4554> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> Philadelphia, <WG5359> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> Laodicea. <WG2993>

And <WG2532> I turned <WG1994> to see <WG991> the <WG3588> voice <WG5456> that <WG3748> spake <WG2980> with <WG3326> me. <WG1700> And <WG2532> being turned, <WG1994> I saw <WG1492> seven <WG2033> golden <WG5552> candlesticks; <WG3087>

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> candlesticks <WG3087> one like unto <WG3664> the Son <WG5207> of man, <WG444> clothed with <WG1746> a garment down to the foot, <WG4158> and <WG2532> girt about <WG4024> <WG4314> the <WG3588> paps <WG3149> with a golden <WG5552> girdle. <WG2223>

<WG1161> His <WG848> head <WG2776> and <WG2532> his hairs <WG2359> were white <WG3022> like <WG5616> wool, <WG2053> as white <WG3022> as <WG5613> snow; <WG5510> and <WG2532> his <WG848> eyes <WG3788> were as <WG5613> a flame <WG5395> of fire; <WG4442>

And <WG2532> his <WG848> feet <WG4228> like unto <WG3664> fine brass, <WG5474> as <WG5613> if they burned <WG4448> in <WG1722> a furnace; <WG2575> and <WG2532> his <WG848> voice <WG5456> as <WG5613> the sound <WG5456> of many <WG4183> waters. <WG5204>

And <WG2532> he had <WG2192> in <WG1722> his <WG848> right <WG1188> hand <WG5495> seven <WG2033> stars: <WG792> and <WG2532> out of <WG1537> his <WG848> mouth <WG4750> went <WG1607> a sharp <WG3691> two-edged <WG1366> sword <WG4501> and <WG2532> his <WG848> countenance <WG3799> was as <WG5613> the <WG3588> sun <WG2246> shineth <WG5316> in <WG1722> his <WG848> strength. <WG1411>

And <WG2532> when <WG3753> I saw <WG1492> him, <WG846> I fell <WG4098> at <WG4314> his <WG848> feet <WG4228> as <WG5613> dead. <WG3498> And <WG2532> he laid <WG2007> his <WG848> right <WG1188> hand <WG5495> upon <WG1909> me, <WG1691> saying <WG3004> unto me, <WG3427> Fear <WG5399> not; <WG3361> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the <WG3588> first <WG4413> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> last: <WG2078>

<WG2532> I am he that liveth, <WG2198> and <WG2532> was <WG1096> dead; <WG3498> and, <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> I am <WG1510> alive <WG2198> forevermore, <WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> Amen; <WG281> and <WG2532> have <WG2192> the <WG3588> keys <WG2807> of hell <WG86> and <WG2532> of death. <WG2288>

Write <WG1125> the things which <WG3739> thou hast seen, <WG1492> and <WG2532> the things which <WG3739> are, <WG1526> and <WG2532> the things which <WG3739> shall <WG3195> be <WG1096> hereafter; <WG3326> <WG5023>

The <WG3588> mystery <WG3466> of the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> stars <WG792> which <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492> in <WG1909> my <WG3450> right hand, <WG1188> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> golden <WG5552> candlesticks. <WG3087> The <WG3588> seven <WG2033> stars <WG792> are <WG1526> the angels <WG32> of the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> churches: <WG1577> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> candlesticks <WG3087> which <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492> are <WG1526> the seven <WG2033> churches. <WG1577>
